title: Dayveon
creator_credit: Steven Reneau, Tiffany Barry, Amman Abbasi, Salem Street Entertainment, Rough House Pictures, Muskat Filmed Properties, Meridian Entertainment, Mama Bear Studios, Alexander Uhlmann, Lachion Buckingham and Symbolic Exchange
brief_description: In the wake of his big brother’s violent death, 13-year-old Dayveon struggles to find his way in an economically depressed Arkansas town. With no parents and few role models around, Dayveon is soon torn between the lure of a local gang and the friendship of his sister’s boyfriend.

constellations_other.name: Warwick Thornton
constellations_other.description: Brimming with Shakespearean undertones and pathos, Kaytetye filmmaker Warwick Thornton's debut feature Samson and Delilah is both a universal tale and one intrinsically tied to the experience of First Peoples in Central Australia.

creator_credit_for_label: Steven Reneau, Tiffany Barry, Amman Abbasi, Salem Street Entertainment, Rough House Pictures, Muskat Filmed Properties, Meridian Entertainment, Mama Bear Studios, Alexander Uhlmann, Lachion Buckingham and Symbolic Exchange
